find_package(Eigen3 REQUIRED)
# Add as "system headers" to avoid warnings generated by them with
# compilers that support that notion.
include_directories(SYSTEM ${EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR})

find_package(Qt4 COMPONENTS QtCore QtGui QtOpenGL REQUIRED)
include_directories(SYSTEM ${QT_INCLUDES})
add_definitions(${QT_DEFINITIONS})

set(HEADERS
  editor.h
  glwidget.h
  manipulator.h
  navigator.h
)

set(SOURCES
  editor.cpp
  glwidget.cpp
  manipulator.cpp
  navigator.cpp
)

avogadro_add_library(AvogadroQtOpenGL ${HEADERS} ${SOURCES})
target_link_libraries(AvogadroQtOpenGL
  AvogadroCore # Needed for editor.cpp, manipulator.cpp
  AvogadroRendering
  AvogadroQtGui
  ${QT_QTCORE_LIBRARY}
  ${QT_QTGUI_LIBRARY}
  ${QT_QTOPENGL_LIBRARY})
